sites.description: Dark fitness equipment landing page with neon-green accents, athlete hero visual, collection cards, community testimonials, and compact footer (reference screenshots included)
sites.prompt: Create a dark premium fitness landing page matching the provided reference: athlete-led hero background, neon-green primary buttons, compact trust strip, engineered-capabilities cards, product collection cards with imagery, community feedback testimonials, a 'Ready to Level Up?' CTA banner, and a compact multi-column footer.
